meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>first</kanji> <kanji>love</kanji> is your <vocabulary>first love</vocabulary> or your <vocabulary>first crush</vocabulary>. This usually refers to the first time you fall in love, but it can also refer to the person you fall in love with.
readingMnemonic: Similarly to 初耳, 初 behaves more like a prefix here, which means that this uses kun'yomi readings. You already know these for both 初 and 恋, so you should be good to go!
